SELECT c.id, au.avatar, au.nickname, IF(rau.nickname is null,'æ— ',rau.nickname) as replyNickname, a.title as articleTitle, c.content, c.create_time FROM blog_tipsoon_comment c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_info_id FROM sys_user ) u ON c.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM blog_user_info ) au ON u.user_info_id = au.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, title FROM blog_tipsoon ) a ON c.tipsoon_id = a.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, user_info_id FROM sys_user ) ru ON c.reply_user_id = ru.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT id, avatar, nickname FROM blog_user_info ) rau ON ru.user_info_id = rau.id
au.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%') or rau.nickname like concat('%',#{keywords},'%')
order by c.create_time desc

select fm.id,fm.create_time,fm.user_id,fm.address,fm.reply_user_id,fm.content,ui.nickname,ui.avatar from blog_tipsoon_comment fm left join sys_user u on fm.user_id=u.user_id left join blog_user_info ui on ui.id=u.user_info_id where fm.tipsoon_id = #{tipsoonId} and fm.parent_id is null order by fm.create_time desc
